name: Super Z Warriors
description:
Welcome to the adventurers' world, Super Z Warriors bring you a brand new idle RPG game for you to deploy and enjoy! Just spend a little bit of time to train your favorite team and you can become a powerful player in this easy idle RPG game!

Summon your favorite Dragon Ball's characters, explore a new world, assemble your best heroes to fight in real-time PvP battles in the arena, bring your favorite heroes into an elite team, and start winning battles! Let's begin this epic adventure in this amazing Dragon Ball universe mobile game!

Game Features:

Idle Battle Gameplay. This idle design of the battle mode lets you fight automatically anytime and anywhere. Put your heroes in your formation and let them upgrade by themself while you are away and you will return to get a more powerful team, and are able to defeat even stronger enemies than when you last logged out of the game!

Heroes Collection:

Super Z Warriors is introducing more than 100 Heroes, come get your hands on them in this game! All of the heroes feature stunning graphics with an HD soundtrack. Don't miss out on this one in a lifetime opportunity to upgrade your mighty heroes and dominate the universe!

Exclusive Costumes:

Dress your heroes in your favorite costumes!

Customized outfits make your heroes unique and outstanding, you can also enjoy various bonuses based on the one you pick!

Build A Powerful Team:

Summon powerful heroes and build your team strategically to defeat the Boss and dominates players all over the world in intense PVP battles.

Switch heroes in different formations and adapt your strategies to win the battles!

Super Z Warriors - the most anticipated new mobile game of 2020! With Idle RPG features at its core, the game combines various gameplays such as hero recruitment and training, arena battles, and more to discover in-game! High-quality graphics and stunning scenes are going to immerse you in the unique fantasy world.
